House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07826
FULL TITLE : AN ACT TO ESTABLISH THE PHILIPPINE ENVIRONMENTAL ASSESSMENT SYSTEM, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Adopts an Environmental Assessment System which is composed of: a.) Strategic Environmental Assessment (SEA) for policies, plans and programs to ensure that Philippines’ development will be sustainable; and b.) Environment Impact Assessment (EIA) for specific projects which have potential significant adverse impact on the environment.
ALIAS NAME : “Philippine Environmental Assessment System Act of 2018.”
